snippet: The company said the cuts would come over the next 18 months and mainly occur in its aerospace division.
lead_paragraph: The company said the cuts would come over the next 18 months and mainly occur in its aerospace division.

headline.main: Jet Engine Maker Rolls-Royce to Cut 5% of Work Force as Demand Dips
headline.print_headline: Jet Engine Maker Rolls-Royce to Cut 5% of Work Force as Demand Dips
